settings.text: A delicious real food prenatal vitamin and postnatal lactation bite. Completely replaces the need for synthetic pills and processed lactation cookies. Designed to nourish mom + baby from conception and pregnancy through postpartum and breastfeeding.

- Free shipping over $75

- Small Batch

- Made in USA

settings.tab_2_content:
Each box is a one-week supply containing 28 energy balls

'Dosage’ is one sleeve (4 balls)/day x 7 days a week to help ensure Mamas are getting the extra energy required for breastfeeding

Each serving supplies at least 10% of your daily macronutrient requirements (carbs, fat, and protein) and essential nutrients to enhance the profile of breastmilk
settings.tab_3_content:
Good nutrition during the first 1000 days, from conception until 2 years of age, has benefits that may last a lifetime

The quality of the maternal diet affects the quality of breast milk

Mama Balls help you create quality breast milk

Whole Food Plant-Based and expertly formulated for new Mamas
settings.tab_4_content:
Try Now & Schedule for Due Date Delivery!
Have you tried Mama Balls and want to perfectly time your subscription for babies' arrival? It's simple!

- Place your first subscription order - You will receive an email with a link to manage your subscription account
- Once in your account select 'Delivery Schedule'
- For your next upcoming order, select your preferred order date as your due-date (this is the date your order will be placed, please allow time for delivery)
- You will receive the order you placed at checkout and then all upcoming orders after the first can be scheduled for your due-date
- Deliveries are automatically scheduled for every 2 weeks
- Cancel at any time! Enjoy!

Change my Subscription Flavor
Want to try a different bi-weekly flavor?

- Login to your subscription account
- Once in your account select 'Subscriptions'
- Click ‘Add Product’ and select your new bi-weekly flavor
- In 'Upcoming Orders,' skip the product that you do not want for the next 2 weeks
- You're all set!


Edit My Delivery Schedule or Address
Not going to be home? You can edit your delivery address to a new location so that you never have to miss an order!

- Login to your subscription account
- Once in your account select the subscription that you would like to edit
- Select 'Next order'
- Click your name and address to edit your shipping address to your preferred delivery location
- Need to skip an order? Edit your delivery schedule by selecting ‘Skip’

settings.title: Support mom with a delicious real food prenatal vitamin and postnatal lactation bite.
Real Food
settings.text: No fakes here. We use organic, whole food ingredients — and nothing synthetic.

settings.title: Real Absorption
settings.text: Real foods provide superior bioavailability, allowing essential nutrients to be effectively absorbed by your body.

settings.title: Real Good
settings.text: Our 7 superfood flavors offer a delicious, nutrient-packed vitamin that you'll crave!

settings.title: A real food prenatal vitamin and lactation bite
settings.text:
Nutrition from the source, as it should be.

  • Comprehensive Nutrition: Each bite is packed with 27 essential micronutrients, vital for maternal and infant health.
  • Plant-Based Purity: Our recipes harness the power of plant-based, organic ingredients, free from gluten and refined sugars.
  • Nature's Intregrity: We avoid synthetic additives, ensuring you and your baby benefit from pure, natural nutrition.

settings.title: Can I replace my prenatal vitamins with Nunona Bites?
settings.text: Absolutely! Our bites are meticulously crafted by dietitians to deliver all necessary prenatal nutrients through real, whole foods, eliminating the need for synthetic pills.

settings.title: How do you ensure the quality and safety of Nunona?
settings.text: We conduct 3rd party testing of every batch before the product is released to the market. We also screen for heavy metals. Ensuring we are at levels well below what the FDA deems safe.

settings.title: What Makes Nunona different from the rest?
settings.text: We are a 100% real food supplement, providing 10% daily macronutrients, 27 micronutrients, and nothing synthetic.

settings.title: How do I store Nunona?
settings.text: Nunona Mama Bites are third-party validated to be shelf-stable for 6 months from the production date. You can keep them out at room temperature or refrigerate if you prefer your bites chilled.

settings.title: Do I need to eat them all at once?
settings.text: No. Nunona is designed to fit into your life so eat them all at once,  one at a time throughout the day, in the middle of the night - you get the idea!

settings.title: Is Nunona Gluten-Free?
settings.text: Yes!  While oats are inherently gluten-free, we source certified gluten-free oats out of an abundance of caution.

settings.title: What is a macronutrient?
settings.text: A macronutrient is a nutrient we need in larger quantities, it can be a carbohydrate, protein or fat. Macronutients provide us with energy. This matters even more in pregnancy and postpartum because energy needs rise drastically in order to be able to grow and feed a baby. In addition to this macronutrients help us absorb micronutrients. (This is why pills say to take with food, and why at Nunona we've developed our supplement to pair macro and micronutrients together - as they are in nature).

settings.title: What is a micronutrient?
settings.text: A micronutrient is a nutrient we need in small amounts - a vitamin or mineral. Our bodies can not produce vitamins or minerals so they are often referred to as 'essential nutrients'. Each vitamin and mineral play a specific role in your body and are responsible for growth, immunity, brain development, nervous system development and preventing and fighting disease. During pregnancy and breastfeeding any shortage of essential nutrients can negatively impact your developing baby. This is why it's commonly recommended to take a pre+postnatal supplement.
